channel.title: A question please help desperate :(
channel.description:
okay well, i was wondering , how can i stop peopple from connecting to my server from another client? i cant find any topic about it? sorry if it is a simple answer just i dont really want people to do it :( alsoo how can i make it so once i upload it no one can edit the files?
thanksyou for your help your all great :D
